overview: The story of  a decent, law-abiding saloon owner who gets himself in trouble with the corrupt city fathers when he attempts to close down the town's watering holes at midnight and on Sundays.
tagline: The soft thud of horses through the dark desert night. The lonely wail of the coyote- then the shrill bark of a sixgun. A slice of palpitating life, brought back from the real west.
title: Bulldog Pluck
